submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumOperations(self, nums: List[int], target: List[int]) -> int:
        # 3 1 3 1 3   4
        # 1 -2 2
        n = len(nums)
        diff = [target[i] - nums[i] for i in range(n)]
        ans = 0
        i = 0
        while i < n:
            if diff[i] == 0:
                i += 1
                continue
            if diff[i] > 0:
                ans += diff[i]  # 正的全部 - 1
                t = diff[i]  # 上一个操作次数 ， 可继承到下一个元素
                start = i
                while i < n and diff[i] > 0:
                    ans += max(diff[i] - t, 0)
                    t = diff[i]
                    i += 1
            elif diff[i] == 0:
                continue
            else:
                ans += -diff[i]
                t = -diff[i]  # 上一个操作次数 ， 可继承到下一个元素
                start = i
                while i < n and diff[i] < 0:
                    ans += max(-diff[i] - t, 0)
                    t = -diff[i]
                    i += 1
        return ans
